price: 98 Que celui qui est l’ennemi d’Allah, de Ses anges, de Ses Messagers, de Gabriel et de Michaël, sache qu’Allah est l’ennemi des mécréants.
arabic: مَن كَانَ عَدُوّٗا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَجِبۡرِيلَ وَمِيكَىٰلَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَدُوّٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: man kāna ʿaduwwan lillahi wamalāikatihi warusulihi wajib'rīla wamīkāla fa-inna al-laha ʿaduwwun lil'kāfirīna
